summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of Magical Kenya Open tournament website. All major functionality working correctly including leaderboard, tickets, registration, and navigation.

flaky_endpoints.symptoms: Returns 422 when empty JSON body sent (expected behavior)
flaky_endpoints.workaround: Proper request body validation working correctly

design_issues.issue: Search input filters correctly but may confuse users when showing 'No players found' message

passed_tests: Backend API endpoints (17/18 tests passed - 94.4% success rate)
Leaderboard displays 8 players with mock tournament data
Countdown timer displays on home page
Hero section with navigation buttons working
Tickets enquiry form opens and validates correctly
Registration page shows Google OAuth login for unauthenticated users
Responsive design works on mobile, tablet, and desktop
Contact and enquiry form submissions working
Tournament info, schedule, and past winners data loading
Gallery and news endpoints responding correctly
